articles.title: Argentina Moto GP: Determined Pol Espargaro Fights to Fourth on Grid
articles.description: Just a single run was all Pol Espargaro had during Q2, but he and his team pulled a rabbit out of the hat to secure the head of the second row with a 1'38.165 - only 0.046s shy of the front row
articles.content:
Pol Espargaro showed off his incredible determination, recovering from a complicated and compacted day to fourth on the grid.

articles.title: Aleix Espargaro Makes History, Hands Aprilia Their First MotoGP Pole
articles.description: Aleix Espargaro shone as Aprilia Racing celebrated their first MotoGP pole position in a dramatic pair of qualifying sessions in Argentina
articles.content: A stunning Saturday afternoon Q2 lap from Aleix Espargaro handed Aprilia Racing their first MotoGP pole position - and the Spaniard’s first pole position since the 2015 Catalan GP. It’s a magnificent day for the Noale factory at the Gran Premio Miche... [5090 chars]

articles.title: World Cup Brazil Argentina Uruguay Ecuador learn foes
articles.description: Brazil, Argentina, Uruguay, and Ecuador have learned their path toward World Cup glory. Here's what to expect from South America's four sides.
articles.content: Twenty years have gone by since South America last got its hands on the World Cup. Since then, strikingly, every Brazil campaign has ended as soon as they have come up against European opposition in the knockout rounds. And though Argentina got past ... [6391 chars]

articles.title: England's route to 2022 World Cup final in Qatar
articles.description: Englands route to World Cup glory could pit them against Senegal, France, Belgium and Brazil if they finish as group winners at Qatar 2022; Netherlands, Argentina, Brazil and France potential route to final if they finish as runners-up in Group B
articles.content:
